entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 02 March 2023
